name: re-type-bootstrap
description: Metamodel for the type and rule system on the Reflective Platform

scripts.setcontext: re context -r; re context -d base -e reflective-metamodel
scripts.deploy: npm run setcontext; re tenant -r; re tenant -t
scripts.postdeploy: npm run drop; npm run create; sleep 1; npm run validate
scripts.validate: echo '{ "query": { "match": { "context.extension": "reflective-metamodel" } } }' | re search -j - | re validate -j - | jq '.objects | .[] | { id: .snapshot.subject.id, valid: .snapshot.valid, error: .snapshot.error }'

author: Reflective Code <code@reflective.dk>
